name: Petzl Trigrest
description: The Trigrest has 2 support positions: a platform for hand switching in the high position, and a brace for the index finger in the low position.Made of plastic.Locking lever (bottom platform) swivels up so you adjust the position on the shaft without tools.Compatible with the Petzl® Ride, Glacier, Glacier Literide, Summit, Sum'tec, and Gully ice axes.
